dictionary

Interface Dictionary

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHashTable, LPHashTable, QPHashTable, SCHashTable

    public interface Dictionary
    Simple customised map interaface.

    A dictionary contains words and their definitions. For any given word there may be more than one definition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsWord(java.lang.String word)
      Returns true if this dictionary contains a definition for the specified word.
      void empty()
      Removes all words from the dictionary.
      java.util.List<Definition> getDefinitions(java.lang.String word)
      Return the entry for the specified word, or null if this dictionary contains no entry for the word.
      void insert(java.lang.String word, Definition definition)
      Inserts the given word and definition.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this dictionary contains no words.
      int size()
      Returns the number of words in this dictionary.

    • Method Detail

      • containsWord

        boolean containsWord(java.lang.String word)
        Returns true if this dictionary contains a definition for the specified word.

      • getDefinitions

        java.util.List<Definition> getDefinitions(java.lang.String word)
        Return the entry for the specified word, or null if this dictionary contains no entry for the word.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if this dictionary contains no words.

      • empty

        void empty()
        Removes all words from the dictionary.

      • insert

        void insert(java.lang.String word,
            Definition definition)
        Inserts the given word and definition.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of words in this dictionary.
